syntactic

Class SyntacticParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • syntactic.SyntacticParser

  • public class SyntacticParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parser do analisador sintatico, recebe a lista de tokens do analisado lexico (pela main) e executa a analise

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<SyntacticException> errors 
      int index 
      java.util.List<Token> tokens 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SyntacticParser(java.util.List<Token> tokens) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOp()
      addop ::= "+" | "-" | ||
      void advance()
      Avança o indexador do tokens
      void assignStmt()
      assign-stmt ::= identifier "=" simple-expr
      void body()
      body ::= [declare decl-list] init stmt-list end
      void condition()
      condition ::= expression
      void constant()
      constant ::= integer_const | float_const | char_const
      void decl()
      decl ::= ident-list : type
      void declList()
      decl-list ::= decl {";" decl}
      void eat(TokenType type)
      Consome o token se este for o esperado, caso nao seja e emitido um erro sintatico.
      void error()
      Emite um erro semantico
      void expression()
      expression ::= simple-expr expression-pref
      void expressionPref()
      expression-pref ::= relop simple-expr | λ
      void factor()
      factor ::= identifier | constant | "(" expression ")"
      void factorA()
      factor-a ::= factor | ! factor | "-" factor
      void identList()
      ident-list ::= identifier {"," identifier}
      void ifStmt()
      if-stmt ::= if condition then stmt-list if-stmt-pref
      void ifStmtPref()
      if-stmt-pref ::= end | else stmt-list end
      void mulOp()
      mulop ::= "*" | "/" | &&
      void program()
      program ::= program identifier is body
      void readStmt()
      readStmt ::= in "<<" identifier
      void relop()
      relop ::= "==" | ">" | ">=" | "<" | "<=" | "!="
      void repeatStmt()
      repeat-stmt ::= repeat stmt-list stmt-suffix
      void run()
      Inicia o parser sintatico
      void simpleExpr()
      simple-expr ::= term simple-expr-esc
      void simpleExprEsc()
      simple-expr-esc ::= addop term simple-expr-esc | lambda
      void stmt()
      stmt ::= assign-stmt | if-stmt | while-stmt | repeat-stmt | read-stmt | write-stmt
      void stmtList()
      stmt-list ::= stmt {";" stmt}
      void stmtPreffix()
      stmt-prefix ::= while condition do
      void stmtSuffix()
      stmt-suffix ::= until condition
      void term()
      term ::= factor-a term-esc
      void termEsc()
      term-esc ::= mulop factor-a term-esc | λ
      void type()
      type ::= int | float | char
      void whileStmt()
      while-stmt ::= stmt-prefix stmt-list end
      void writable()
      writable ::= simple-expr | literal
      void writeStmt()
      write-stmt ::= out ">>" writable
